Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Na prodaju je prostrana kuća od 315m2 u naselju Markuševečki Popovec. Kuća je do sadašnjeg roh bau stanja dograđena 2008. godine te je po tome legalizirana i ishođeno je Riješenje o izvedenome stanju. Nalazi se u mirnoj ulici, prepunoj zelenila, a opet blizu svih sadržaja neophodnih za život. Prizemlje, prvi kat i potkrovlje legalizirani su kao stambeni prostor, dok se u prizemlju lijevo nalazi još garažni prostor za dva automobila. Svaka etaža ima zaseban ulaz pa se prema tome može razmotriti opcija etažiranja i pretvorbe u tri stana. Ulicom ispred kuće prometuje redovna ZET-ova autobusna linija. Dostupni smo za više informacija i razgled nekretnine. Kristijan Cerovec +385 91 372 1877 For sale is a spacious house of 315 m2 in the Markuševečki Popovec settlement. The house was extended to its current state in 2008, and accordingly it was legalized and a Decision on the executed condition was issued. It is located in a quiet street, full of greenery, yet close to all amenities necessary for life. The ground floor, first floor and attic are legalized as residential space, while on the ground floor on the left there is a garage space for two cars. Each floor has a separate entrance, so the option of sharing and converting into three apartments can be considered. A regular ZET bus line runs through the street in front of the house. We are available for more information and a tour of the property. Kristijan Cerovec +385 91 372 1877
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Peć na kruta goriva
